rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides advice using neutral language ('urged...to report').
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with explicit scale or impact information.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment provides instructions but contains no explicit calming language.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes recommended actions/safeguards ('urged... to report any unexplained bird deaths') factually without active reassurance.
